meanings.sent1: The potion slowly animalizes the human into a wolf.

meanings.definition: To treat or portray as an animal.
meanings.sent1: In the play, the actor animalizes the villain as a cunning fox.
meanings.sent2: The cartoon character animalizes the mischievous cat with his antics.
meanings.sent3: The comedian humorously animalizes his friend as a lazy sloth.
meanings.sent4: The author metaphorically animalizes the city as a roaring lion in his novel.
meanings.sent5: The photographer skillfully animalizes the model, capturing her wild beauty.
